ygData.subject: Raising from level 26
ygData.msgSnippet: I can get to level 26 in smithing pretty easily. After this I have heard a few ways to raise skills here. Skewers, (skalers?), or large lanterns. I want to
ygData.messageBody:
I can get to level 26 in smithing pretty easily. After this I have heard a
few ways to raise skills here. Skewers, (skalers?), or large lanterns. I
want to know which way is the most effective but does not cost so much
money. I hear all kinds of differant opinions, and I just wanted some
information. If someone on Xegony could give me character a /tell (Irontoe),
or just send me an e-mail back.

Irontoe Peacebringer - Paladin of Justice
